trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento es desencadenado por el host del diseñador para determinadas acciones en un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> se controla mediante un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar el método, que toma un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un delegado predeterminado para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles personalizados reemplazan los <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para procesar los eventos del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El host del diseñador inicializa un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para el tipo de acción en la superficie de diseño y, a continuación, envía el objeto a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad representa la región del Diseñador de control que se aplica el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica qué tipo de acción:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad proporciona los argumentos del evento que son específicos del tipo de acción.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objects as follows:
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el host del diseñador inicializa <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objetos como se indica a continuación:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> al hacer clic en una región del objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> objeto cuando se dibuja un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> objeto cuando se cambia el modo de edición de plantillas para el control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre eventos y delegados, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.
trans-unit.target: Tipo de acción que ha provocado el evento; se utiliza para inicializar la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Región del diseñador a la que se aplica la acción; se utiliza para inicializar la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with <c>eventType</c>; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos del evento asociados a <c>eventType</c>; se usan para inicializar la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> para el tipo de evento de vista en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor se usa por el host del diseñador para inicializar un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: El host del diseñador pasa el inicializado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> el objeto a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Por lo general, `region` está establecido para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos, y `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los argumentos del evento que están asociados a la acción que ha provocado el evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: Propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> que contiene datos de evento adicionales que son específicos del tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad proporciona los argumentos del evento que son específicos del tipo de acción que se especifica en el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, al hacer clic en una región, el host del diseñador inicializa la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> como un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos y, a continuación, inicializa el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad como un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Del mismo modo, el host del diseñador inicializa el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> objeto para un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos, o un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> de objeto para un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad se inicializa con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el tipo de acción que ha generado el evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> que especifica el tipo de acción que ha provocado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica qué tipo de acción que provocó el evento:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad proporciona los argumentos del evento que son específicos del tipo de acción.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propiedad se inicializa con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la región del diseñador a la que se aplica el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: Región <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> a la que se aplica la acción.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad representa la región del Diseñador de control que se aplica el evento.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad se establece para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos, y `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad se inicializa con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
